Introduction
This is a sample package showing how to use the &homalg; package to perform simple computations in algebraic topology. For serious applications please use &Kenzo; . You are invited to extend &alexander; in all directions.
The package is named after the influential topologist James Waddell Alexander (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Waddell_Alexander) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Waddell_Alexander http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Waddell_Alexander.
